description: Premium developer, Masteri brand portfolio including Masteri Thao Dien, Lumiere series. Part of Thao Dien Investment.
Largest residential developer in Vietnam by market cap. Part of Vingroup. Mega-township developments.
Major HCMC developer. Projects in Districts 2, 7, and satellite cities. Financial restructuring in 2023-2024.
Fast-growing developer focused on mid-to-high-end apartments. The Matrix One, The Cosmopolitan.
Leading developer in eastern HCMC, Binh Duong. Known for mid-end segment.
Eastern HCMC specialist. Townhouse and villa projects in District 9/Thu Duc.
Developer and master planner of Phu My Hung new urban area in District 7.
Singapore-based developer. Vista Verde, Feliz En Vista, d'Edge projects in HCMC.
Developer and real estate services. The Prive, Gem Riverside, Opal projects.
Affordable-to-mid segment. Akari City, Flora series, Mizuki Park. Japanese partnerships (Nishi Nippon, Hankyu Hanshin).
The Gio developer. Western HCMC and Binh Duong specialist.
Hanoi-based eco-township developer. Ecopark township in Hung Yen.
Diversified group: hospitality, real estate, entertainment. Sun Feliza Suites, Sun Grand City series.
Binh Duong industrial and urban development corporation. Master planner of VSIP.
Growing developer. La Pura in Thu Duc. Land bank in HCMC and central Vietnam.
Malaysian developer. Eaton Park (HCMC), Celadon City. Hilton hotel management partnerships.
Hanoi-focused luxury developer. Noble Crystal Tay Ho with WorldHotels branding.
South Korean developer. Starlake township in Tay Ho, Hanoi. The Prime K8 series.
Developer of Picity Sky Park in Di An, Binh Duong. Smart home and IOT integration.
Developer of Happy One series in Binh Duong. Japanese-inspired design concepts.
